titles.title: To authorize the expansion of the Fort Davis National Historic Site in Fort Davis, Texas, and for other purposes.
To authorize the expansion of the Fort Davis National Historic Site in Fort Davis, Texas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire additional acreage to increase the size of the Fort Davis National Historic Site near the town of Fort Davis, Texas, by acquiring certain land from willing sellers.
